data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry, Pešić, Vladimir (2014): Water mites from Mount Kinabalu and the Crocker Range, Borneo, Malaysia (Acari: Hydrachnidia), with the description of 34 new species. Zootaxa 3876 (1): 1-71, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3876.1.1
